## Matrix.FromFloatArrayToRefScaled() method

Stores an array into a matrix after having multiplied each component by a given factor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromFloatArrayToRefScaled(array: FloatArray, offset: number, scale: number, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the source array |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the source array |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scaling factor |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
